structure.unit: Consumer Choice Of Physician Assistant Services

law.catch_line: Physician Assistant To Be Considered Qualified As Primary Care Provider
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 216 effective November 4, 2012.] A participating provider physician assistant practicing within the scope of such physician assistant's license, including all regulations requiring collaboration with or supervision by a physician under section 9E of chapter 112, shall be considered qualified within the carrier's definition of primary care provider to an insured.
